English: On the other side of the bridge, there's a wolf
You can collect feathers from chickens
You can fish in the river

Korean: 뒤쪽에 있는 언덕을 올라갈 수 있습니다
English: You can go up the hill in the back

Korean: 언덕 위에는 루비와 사파이어 광석이 있습니다
English: There are rubies and sapphire ore on the hill
Dig up the ore and collect the rubies
Dig up the ore and collect the rubies

Korean: (공격을 하기 위해서는 검과 방패를 착용해야 합니다)
English: You must wear a sword and shield in order to strike
